cluster_relations.rel_desc: The fears and anxieties are held collectively by society.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject holds, owns, or has control over the object (which can be a tangible asset, power, or an abstract attribute such as fears or anxieties).
cluster_relations.subject_class_label: Societal Fears and Anxieties in Legends

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Corporations are described as the holders of the concentration of power enabled by AI.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject holds, owns, or has control over the object (which can be a tangible asset, power, or an abstract attribute such as fears or anxieties).

qualifiers.SpatialQualifier: in the hands of a few corporations

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is owned by, attributed to, or collectively associated with the object (for example, fears belonging to a particular society).
args.justification: The current canonical_rel_name 'possesses' implies that the subject holds or controls the object, but in this instance the subject is 'fears and anxieties of society' and the object is 'society'. Semantically, the fears are attributed to or belong to the society, not that the fears possess the society. Updating the canonical_rel_name to 'belongs_to' (and adjusting the description) correctly captures the intended direction and meaning while keeping the same broader possession/attribution relation class and group.

executed_decisions.justification: The current canonical_rel_name 'possesses' implies that the subject holds or controls the object, but in this instance the subject is 'fears and anxieties of society' and the object is 'society'. Semantically, the fears are attributed to or belong to the society, not that the fears possess the society. Updating the canonical_rel_name to 'belongs_to' (and adjusting the description) correctly captures the intended direction and meaning while keeping the same broader possession/attribution relation class and group.
